main event: An unidentified object was observed in the North Pacific on August 23, 1958, exhibiting changing shapes and colors before rapidly ascending to the east.
interesting points: The object was perceived as changing shape due to wind velocity and distortion., It had varying colors of white and yellow., There was no sound heard during the observation., The object hovered for approximately 10 minutes before rising rapidly., The sighting is classified as a possible bolide observation.
sighted object: an unidentified aerial phenomenon described as an elliptical object
